      • processSpriteModeSwitch

        public void processSpriteModeSwitch()
        One of the methods responsible for modifying element positions depending on using animated sprites or not. Using animated sprites requires modifying sizes of some elements.
        See Also:
        BattleController.processSpriteModeSwitch(), AddPokemonController.processSpriteModeSwitch()

        Fills the summary screen with information about the currently previewed Pokémon.
        Parameters:
        index - index of the player's party member
